channel.title: [PI] looking for the brokenx bone drop rep++
channel.description:
looking for the brokenx source bonedrop fix,
i had read and found out they changed names to dspk and haave the bones fixed but i have done months worth of work with the source i have and just cant afford to move to the uppdated version
i have fixed the melee rranged bow problem and now the only real big issue is bone drops besides clipping which clipping wont be to hard to do.
will rep++ first person who gives the fix
